page.title: 04Stowmarket Road Links.
page.content: This area contains many miles of country lanes where two cars can pass only with difficulty, and whose surfaces are poor. There are also Class B roads and the old A45, which had become quite inadequate some twenty years ago. The town and villages suffered from the constant flow of heavy traffic. The construction of the new A45 has largely removed this problem. It is a fast dual carriage way road which by-passes centres of population. It enables drivers to reach the A1 far more swiftly and, in conjunction with national road improvement schemes, enables people who start their journey in Stowmarket to reduce their travelling time to all parts of the country.
